import requests

SUPABASE_URL = ''https://vhovrdqfpsdeynsmvleu.supabase.co''
SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY = ''eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSIsInJlZiI6InZob3ZyZHFmcHNkZXluc212bGV1Iiwicm9sZSI6InNlcnZpY2Vfcm9sZSIsImlhdCI6MTc2OTM1NTgyOCwiZXhwIjoyMDg0OTMxODI4fQ.YZ2Y6U7YxyfnjpvXTXSNSUSdR-tsrXmm60ofzRoJum8''

base_url = SUPABASE_URL.rstrip\(''/''\)
table_url = f''{base_url}/rest/v1/members''
headers = {
    ''apikey'': SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY,
    ''Authorization'': f''Bearer {SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY}'',
    ''Accept'': ''application/json'',
}
params = {
    ''select'': ''member_id,full_name,membership_type,status'',
    ''order'': ''created_at.desc'',
}

resp = requests.get\(table_url, headers=headers, params=params, timeout=10\)
print\(f''Status: {resp.status_code}''\)
print\(f''Response: {resp.text[:500]}''\)

data = resp.json\(\)
print\(f''Total members: {len\(data\)}''\)
for m in data:
    print\(f""  - {m.get\(''full_name''\)}: membership_type=''{m.get\(''membership_type''\)}''""\)
")
